phrases.original: Once you have invited a friend to a church-related event using the Invites App, now you need to help them remember to attend. Follow up calls will do that! But sometimes you just can't manage to reach them in alive conversation. All the while the date of the event is approaching, and you don't want them to miss it. The Invites App helps the invitee remember to attend by showing them an automatic reminder from their own device's Calendar app, and at just the right time. This will work even when their device does not have a signal.

phrases.original: Share your Faith, Even When Time is Limited:

phrases.original: Share all of the event's details to the invitee's device instantly, freeing you to use a brief moment to build rapport instead of fixating on details. The whole interaction can take place within one minute.

phrases.original: Never again forget or overlook anyone you've invited. Make all of your follow-up calls and texts. Take notes. Create follow-up reminders to yourself, all from one convenient place.
